name: IAI
description:
This game is about IAI in Japan. (The creator is Japanese).

Players are given a signal (!) Press the left click when the
The winner is the one who can left-click faster than the enemy.

There are three difficulty levels: Easy, Normal, and Hard.

Easy
Beginner mode

Normal
Mode for people who have had enough of Easy mode.

Hard
Mode for people who want to test themselves.

Your fastest move will decide the winner.

Hidden Mode
A mode to test your samurai spirit

For Video Creators and Streamers
Monetization through video production using this game is permitted.
Please refrain from any actions that may unduly change the impression of the game.

Words from the Developer
We believe that everyone who plays this game has a heart that never loses itself.
